optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 12 and USD 21 per person (approximately)

510b7ddba0a994200200005a.description: With a stay at Omni San Francisco Hotel, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from Wells Fargo History Museum and 555 California Street. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Union Square and Lombard Street. Make yourself at home in one of the 362 air-conditioned rooms featuring MP3 docking stations and minibars. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with premium TV channels provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and designer toiletries. Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in San Francisco? This hotel has 12000 square feet (1080 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.
510b7ddba0a994200200005a.name: Omni San Francisco Hotel

548468dec0852e47a00000a8.description: Payne Mansion Hotel offers a great location, putting you within a 15-minute walk of Asian Art Museum of San Francisco and Louise Davies Symphony Hall. Guests will have free perks like WiFi and wired Internet. Rooms at this upscale guest house offer up nice touches like slippers and pillowtop beds with premium linens.
548468dec0852e47a00000a8.name: Payne Mansion Hotel

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 5 and USD 35 per person (approximately)

509c013b66edc846610440ec.hotel_header: Central San Francisco hotel steps from Union Square and cable cars
509c013b66edc846610440ec.description: Located just a few steps from Union Square and a thrilling cable car ride to Fisherman's Wharf, North Beach and Chinatown, this downtown San Francisco hotel has valet and self parking, a rooftop pool and a swanky tavern.
509c013b66edc846610440ec.name: Hilton San Francisco Union Square

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 19 and USD 38 per person (approximately)

509bfdc266edc84661018ea4.description: Grande dame mansion-hotel and restaurant atop Nob Hill Landmarks with a vista Perched atop one of San Francisco’s “Seven Hills,” Fairmont San Francisco is a testament to the glory of the City by the Bay. Conveniently located at the only spot in town where all the cable car lines intersect, you can easily ride up those famously steep hills. Chinatown, shops, bayside You can hop a cable car to Fisherman’s Wharf to explore the waterside attractions and spot the sea lions at Pier 39. It's a 4-minute walk to Chinatown, where you can nosh on Dim Sum or bubble teas, and if you need retail therapy, head to Union Square. Fine and festive dining If you’re craving regional cuisine head to Laurel Court, or have a cocktail at the Pacific Rim-inspired Tonga Room and Hurricane Bar. Live music plays most nights at Laurel Court’s piano bar or you can catch the Tonga Room’s house band, The Island Groove. Onsite parking is available (surcharge). Stately ambiance, comfort The 591 guestrooms feature elegant designs along with premium bedding and furnishings to create the royal treatment feeling. All 62 suites offer spectacular views of the bay and the city, and some include a private balcony or terrace.
509bfdc266edc84661018ea4.name: Fairmont San Francisco

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 8 and USD 26 per person (approximately)
optional_fees.Pet Fee: USD 50.00 per pet, per stay plus USD 50 one-time cleaning fee

56380c88f6d99b17195a3d86.description: 4-star hotel atop prestigious Nob Hill Across from the cable car Chinatown's culture and cuisine are a 5-minute walk from this downtown San Francisco hotel, and fashionable shops like Gucci and Saks Fifth Avenue are 4 blocks downhill at Union Square. A cable car stop is right across the street. The Bay and a play The ferry terminal is 1 mile away for Bay Area day cruises, and you can catch a play at the Tony Award-winning American Conservatory Theater, 6 blocks from the Stanford Court. The landmark Grace Cathedral provides a peaceful respite - and it's a mere 2 blocks from the hotel. You can start your day at Aurea Café with organic coffee and juice, and end it with a nightcap in the lounge. Elegant and tech-savvy With their dark wood furniture and golden palette, guestrooms offer all the must-haves, including flat-screen TVs, free HBO, and iPod docking stations. Many rooms feature sweeping views of the city, and all have Serta® Perfect Sleeper® beds with goose-down duvets.
56380c88f6d99b17195a3d86.name: Stanford Court San Francisco

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 22 and USD 32 per person (approximately)

5257f8457f2c6c2dd900020c.description: With a stay at San Francisco Marriott Marquis, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from Westfield Metreon and Museum of Craft and Folk Art. This 4-star hotel is close to Union Square and Lombard Street. Make yourself at home in one of the 1,499 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Premium TV channels provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Dont miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and wedding services. Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.
5257f8457f2c6c2dd900020c.name: San Francisco Marriott Marquis

optional_fees.Facilities Fee: USD 25 per accommodation, per stay and includes use of: Fitness facilities; Sauna; Spa tub; Swimming pool

509bfdce66edc846610193c3.description: With a stay at Hotel Nikko San Francisco, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from American Conservatory Theater and SHN Curran Theatre. This 4-star hotel is close to Union Square and Lombard Street. Make yourself at home in one of the 532 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Bathrooms feature separate bathtubs and showers, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls. Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a nightclub, a health club, and an indoor pool. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon. Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Planning an event in San Francisco? This hotel has 2700 square feet (251 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.
509bfdce66edc846610193c3.name: Hotel Nikko San Francisco

509bfdd366edc846610197ed.description: Modern hotel with an outdoor pool next to Fisherman's Wharf A block to the cable car The Holiday Inn San Francisco-Fisherman's Wharf is next to Fisherman's Wharf, with Ghirardelli Square 2 blocks away and the cable car around the corner. Russian Hill and winding Lombard Street are a 7-minute walk away, and you can reach Little Italy at North Beach in 10 minutes. Wharf, burritos, Alcatraz You can enjoy the many neighboring cafés and shops, and within 20 minutes you can walk to the Alcatraz ferry or drive down to the Mission District for its famed burritos. A 15-minute drive past the Palace of Fine Arts Theatre in the Presidio takes you to the Golden Gate Bridge. 2 restaurants This contemporary hotel meets the needs of active guests with a fitness center and a heated outdoor pool, open year-round. The Bristol Bar and Grill offers a sit-down breakfast or a buffet, as well as dinner and room service, while cocktails entice in the lounge. Free WiFi The 585 smoke-free rooms have free WiFi and wired internet, coffeemakers, and free morning newspapers. You'll find premium movie channels when flipping through the room's cable TV, windows that open to let in the bay air, and some rooms also include sofa beds for additional space.
509bfdd366edc846610197ed.name: Holiday Inn San Francisco-Fisherman's Wharf

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 20 and USD 150 per person (approximately)

509bfdd266edc846610196db.description: The Palace - Luxury Collection hotel is centrally located in downtown San Francisco, at the intersection of Market and New Montgomery streets. Convenient BART system trains stop directly in front of the hotel, and plentiful shops and cultural attractions are within a 15-minute walk.       In 1875, William Ralston realized his dream of opening a property that would surpass Europe's finest lodgings. The entire property was most recently renovated in 2015. Today, the historic atrium-style Garden Court boasts a soaring stained-glass dome and Austrian crystal chandeliers, serving breakfast, lunch, and classic City Brunch. Pied Piper is the home of the famed Maxfield Parrish Pied Piper of Hamilton mural, and the QC Lounge offers guests a sleek cocktail experience. The Palace Hotel offers 53,000 sq. feet (4,924 sq. meters) of function space that includes 3 dramatically designed ballrooms. Events are also accommodated in 23 smaller rooms. A weekday business center offers full services. Wired and wireless Internet access is available in public areas (surcharge). A pool-view fitness facility features a complete range of workout equipment as well as marble-clad changing rooms. The light-infused atrium pool features chaise loungers and neutral stone accents, and a spa tub is available.        Guests can relax in the hotel's 556 elegant guestrooms, which boast spacious 11-foot ceilings and sophisticated furniture. Beds feature luxurious headboards, pillowtop mattresses, and down duvets. Wireless Internet access is available for a fee, and each room contains a laptop-compatible safe. Entertainment amenities include 48-inch flat-panel TVs. Ensuite marble bathrooms include designer toiletries, bathrobes, and slippers. All rooms include refrigerators, and in-room dining is available 24 hours a day.
509bfdd266edc846610196db.name: Palace Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, San Francisco

509c01f266edc8466104d10d.description: Hotel with free breakfast near Fisherman's Wharf Walk to the bay Situated in the Russian Hill area, da Vinci Villa is 1 mile from Fisherman's Wharf. A 10-minute stroll takes you to the winding road on Lombard Street, while getting around the city is easy with bus stations within a block. Cab to Alcatraz Cruises Boutique shops at Ghirardelli Square and the famous Irish Coffee of Buena Vista Café are both 10 minutes away on foot. For something more historic, you can head to Alcatraz Cruises, an 8-minute cab ride away, and tour the iconic prison. Free breakfast and iPads® The da Vinci Villa Café serves free continental breakfast daily, and guests have use of iPad®s in the lobby to plan their adventures. You can work out in the fitness center, and soothe tired muscles in the outdoor heated pool or sauna. Guests can make use of the 500 square feet (46 square meters) of meeting space. Premium bed, free WiFi Many rooms offer a view of the city or courtyard, and all guests can use free WiFi to stay connected. The 37-inch flat-screen TVs come with cable, and a great night's sleep is in store on your Serta Perfect Sleeper© mattress.
509c01f266edc8466104d10d.name: da Vinci Villa

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 10 and USD 37 per person (approximately)

509bfdc766edc8466101926b.description: With a stay at The Westin St Francis on Union Square, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from Union Square and San Francisco Magic Parlor. This 4-star hotel is close to Lombard Street and Fisherman's Wharf. Make yourself at home in one of the 1,195 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), gift shops/newsstands, and shopping on site. Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and express check-out. Planning an event in San Francisco? This hotel has 56,000 square feet (5203 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.
509bfdc766edc8466101926b.name: The Westin St. Francis San Francisco on Union Square

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 8 and USD 20 per person (approximately)

509bfe9966edc84661022729.description: With a stay at Club Quarters in San Francisco, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from Embarcadero Center and TransAmerica Redwood Forest. This eco-friendly hotel is close to Union Square and Pier 39. Make yourself at home in one of the 346 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a health club, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features a fireplace in the lobby and a television in the lobby. Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
509bfe9966edc84661022729.name: Club Quarters Hotel in San Francisco

509bfcc966edc8466100c79f.description: With a stay at The Mosser, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from Westfield Metreon and Museum of Craft and Folk Art. This family-friendly hotel is close to Union Square and Lombard Street. Make yourself at home in one of the 166 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as ceiling fans and irons/ironing boards. Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility. Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.
509bfcc966edc8466100c79f.name: The Mosser

509bfe3566edc8466101e07e.description: With a stay at Mystic Hotel by Charlie Palmer, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from San Francisco Magic Parlor and minutes from Union Square. This hotel is close to Lombard Street and Fisherman's Wharf. Make yourself at home in one of the 82 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and irons/ironing boards, as well as phones with voice mail. Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Parking (subject to charges) is conveniently located nearby.
509bfe3566edc8466101e07e.name: Mystic Hotel by Charlie Palmer

509bfdd066edc84661019597.description: San Francisco hotel with gym, in Theater District Union Square shops The Serrano Hotel, an elegant landmark in the Theater District since it opened in 1928, is a 2-minute walk from shows at the famed Curran Theatre. It's a 7-minute walk from the many shopping and dining options at both Union Square and the Westfield San Francisco Centre mall. Exploration by cable car You'll be a 6-minute walk from the Powell-Market Cable Car Turntable, where 2 lines begin trips though fashionable Nob Hill and end near the famed Fisherman's Wharf. Lombard Street, the so-called "crookedest street in the world," is a 9-minute drive away. Free wine hour After admiring the lobby's baroque decor, or sipping drinks at the free wine hour on Tuesday and Thursday nights, you can order from a tavern-inspired menu at Jasper’s Corner Tap and Kitchen. You can also work out in the 24-hour fitness center. WiFi and deluxe bedding Bright, bold colors and natural light from large windows fill the 236 guestrooms, which come furnished with minibars and offer flat-screen TVs. The beds are topped with comfy Frette® linens and you can check emails thanks to the availability of in-room WiFi.
509bfdd066edc84661019597.name: Serrano Hotel

509bfdc466edc8466101900b.description: With a stay at InterContinental San Francisco, you'll be centrally located in San Francisco, steps from Intersection for the Arts and minutes from San Francisco Mint. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Union Square and Lombard Street. Make yourself at home in one of the 550 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and plasma televisions. Digital programming and video-game consoles are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), gift shops/newsstands, and wedding services. Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.
509bfdc466edc8466101900b.name: InterContinental San Francisco

509bfdc766edc846610192bd.hotel_header: Downtown San Francisco high-rise near Union Square
509bfdc766edc846610192bd.description: Located just a couple blocks from Union Square and steps away from San Francisco's main Market Street, this downtown hotel offers convenient parking, airport shuttle service, business facilities, a health club and on-site restaurants.
509bfdc766edc846610192bd.name: Parc 55 San Francisco - A Hilton Hotel

509bfdd366edc84661019778.description: This San Francisco hotel is less than a block from the California Street cable-car terminus and 1 block from several bus stops. Japantown is about 4 blocks south. Union Square is 0.8 mile (1.3 kilometers) from the hotel, and Fisherman's Wharf is 1.5 miles (2.4 kilometers) north.  A heated outdoor pool and sundeck provide panoramic city views. The business and fitness centers are open 24 hours-a-day. The 24-hour front desk is staffed by employees who speak multiple languages. Café Marlette is open for breakfast and lunch. The casual Interlude Bar and Grill offers large flat-screen TVs, pool tables, a dinner menu, and a full bar for happy hour. Room service is available mornings and evenings. Self-parking is available (surcharge). Wireless and wired Internet access are complimentary. Holiday Inn Golden Gateway is smoke-free.  In all 496 guestrooms, large windows frame city views. 37-inch LCD TVs come with HBO and pay movies. Rooms also offer complimentary wireless and wired Internet access. Coffee/tea makers and compact refrigerators are provided. The hotel offers complimentary newspaper delivery. Pets up to 35 pounds (surcharge) are permitted in standard guestrooms. Connecting/adjoining rooms are also available on request.
509bfdd366edc84661019778.name: Holiday Inn Golden Gateway

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD 20 and USD 30 per person (approximately)
optional_fees.Pet Fee: USD 100.00 per accommodation, per stay plus USD 50 one-time cleaning fee

509bff1566edc8466102809d.hotel_header: Hotel with sweeping city views in San Francisco's downtown museum district
509bff1566edc8466102809d.description: Located across from the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and close to Union Square, the suites at this downtown museum district hotel have floor-to-ceiling windows that offer stunning SF views.
509bff1566edc8466102809d.name: Park Central Hotel San Francisco, a Starwood Hotel

optional_fees.Breakfast Fee: between USD $5.00 and USD $22.00 per person (approximately)

55dddc68c0852e77940000b9.description: When you stay at Axiom Hotel San Francisco, you'll be in a great location, within just a 10-minute walk of Westfield San Francisco Centre and Union Square. Guests can visit the 24-hour fitness center for a workout or grab a bite to eat at The Turn Cafe, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Rooms at this upscale hotel get the details right with nice touches like iPod docks, MP3 docks, and premium bedding.
55dddc68c0852e77940000b9.name: Axiom Hotel San Francisco
